verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <S%H8435><s%> Now these [are] the generations בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> of Noah שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> Shem חָ֣ם <S%H2526><s%> Ham וָיָ֑פֶת <S%H3315><s%> and Japheth וַיִּוָּלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> born לָהֶ֛ם בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> and unto them were sons אַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <S%H3999><s%> the flood

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יֶ֔פֶת <S%H3315><s%> of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <S%H4074><s%> and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <S%H3120><s%> and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <S%H8422><s%> and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <S%H8494><s%> and Tiras
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons גֹּ֑מֶר <S%H1586><s%> of Gomer אַשְׁכֲּנַ֥ז <S%H813><s%> Ashkenaz וְרִיפַ֖ת <S%H7384><s%> and Riphath וְתֹגַרְמָֽה׃ <S%H8425><s%> and Togarmah

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יָוָ֖ן <S%H3120><s%> of Javan אֱלִישָׁ֣ה <S%H473><s%> Elishah וְתַרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> and Tarshish כִּתִּ֖ים <S%H3794><s%> Kittim וְדֹדָנִֽים׃ <S%H1721><s%> and Dodanim

מֵ֠אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> these נִפְרְד֞וּ <S%H6504><s%> divided in אִיֵּ֤י <S%H339><s%> By these were the isles הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles בְּאַרְצֹתָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> their lands אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לִלְשֹׁנ֑וֹ <S%H3956><s%> after his tongue לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families בְּגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> in their nations
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons חָ֑ם <S%H2526><s%> of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> and Mizraim וּפ֥וּט <S%H6316><s%> and Phut וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> and Canaan

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons כ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> of Cush סְבָא֙ <S%H5434><s%> Seba וַֽחֲוִילָ֔ה <S%H2341><s%> and Havilah וְסַבְתָּ֥ה <S%H5454><s%> and Sabtah וְרַעְמָ֖ה <S%H7484><s%> and Raamah וְסַבְתְּכָ֑א <S%H5455><s%> and Sabtecha וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons רַעְמָ֖ה <S%H7484><s%> of Raamah שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <S%H1719><s%> and Dedan

וְכ֖וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> And Cush יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִמְרֹ֑ד <S%H5248><s%> Nimrod ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הֵחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> he began לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> to be גִּבֹּ֖ר <S%H1368><s%> a mighty one בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become גִבֹּֽר־ <S%H1368><s%> He was a mighty צַ֖יִד <S%H6718><s%> hunter לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> wherefore יֵֽאָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> it is said כְּנִמְרֹ֛ד <S%H5248><s%> Even as Nimrod גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> the mighty צַ֖יִד <S%H6718><s%> hunter לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become רֵאשִׁ֤ית <S%H7225><s%> And the beginning מַמְלַכְתּוֹ֙ <S%H4467><s%> of his kingdom בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> was Babel וְאֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H751><s%> and Erech וְאַכַּ֣ד <S%H390><s%> and Accad וְכַלְנֵ֑ה <S%H3641><s%> and Calneh בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land שִׁנְעָֽר׃ <S%H8152><s%> of Shinar

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Out of that land הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went forth אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> Asshur וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> and builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִ֣ינְוֵ֔ה <S%H5210><s%> Nineveh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְחֹבֹ֥ת <S%H7344><s%> Rehoboth עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּֽלַח׃ <S%H3625><s%> and Calah

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֶ֔סֶן <S%H7449><s%> And Resen בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> between Nineveh וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between כָּ֑לַח <S%H3625><s%> and Calah הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַגְּדֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> the same [is] a great

וּמִצְרַ֡יִם <S%H4714><s%> And Mizraim יָלַ֞ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לוּדִ֧ים <S%H3866><s%> Ludim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲנָמִ֛ים <S%H6047><s%> and Anamim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְהָבִ֖ים <S%H3853><s%> and Lehabim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְתֻּחִֽים׃ <S%H5320><s%> and Naphtuhim

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּתְרֻסִ֞ים <S%H6625><s%> And Pathrusim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּסְלֻחִ֗ים <S%H3695><s%> and Casluhim אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> (out of whom came מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> Philistine וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּפְתֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H3732><s%> Caphthorim ס
וּכְנַ֗עַן <S%H3667><s%> And Canaan יָלַ֛ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִידֹ֥ן <S%H6721><s%> Sidon בְּכֹר֖וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> and Heth
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> And the Jebusite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorite וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַגִּרְגָּשִֽׁי׃ <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgasite
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחִוִּ֥י <S%H2340><s%> And the Hivite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽעַרְקִ֖י <S%H6208><s%> and the Arkite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסִּינִֽי׃ <S%H5513><s%> and the Sinite

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַרְוָדִ֥י <S%H721><s%> And the Arvadite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצְּמָרִ֖י <S%H6786><s%> and the Zemarite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2577><s%> and the Hamathite וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward נָפֹ֔צוּ <S%H6327><s%> spread abroad מִשְׁפְּח֖וֹת <S%H4940><s%> were the families הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽי׃ <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites

וַֽיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> extended גְּב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites מִצִּידֹ֔ן <S%H6721><s%> was from Sidon בֹּאֲכָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> as thou comest גְרָ֖רָה <S%H1642><s%> to Gerar עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> unto Gaza בֹּאֲכָ֞ה <S%H935><s%> as thou goest סְדֹ֧מָה <S%H5467><s%> unto Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah וְאַדְמָ֥ה <S%H126><s%> and Admah וּצְבֹיִ֖ם <S%H6636><s%> and Zeboim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far לָֽשַׁע׃ <S%H3962><s%> even unto Lasha

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons חָ֔ם <S%H2526><s%> of Ham לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לִלְשֹֽׁנֹתָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> after their tongues בְּאַרְצֹתָ֖ם <S%H776><s%> in their countries בְּגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> [and] in their nations ס

וּלְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8035><s%> Unto Shem יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> even to him were [children] born גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> also the father כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of all the children עֵ֔בֶר <S%H5677><s%> of Eber אֲחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> the brother יֶ֥פֶת <S%H3315><s%> of Japheth הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> the elder

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The children שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> of Shem עֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> Elam וְאַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> and Asshur וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> and Arphaxad וְל֥וּד <S%H3865><s%> and Lud וַֽאֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> and Aram
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the children אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of Aram ע֥וּץ <S%H5780><s%> Uz וְח֖וּל <S%H2343><s%> and Hul וְגֶ֥תֶר <S%H1666><s%> and Gether וָמַֽשׁ׃ <S%H4851><s%> and Mash

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> And Arphaxad יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֑לַח <S%H7974><s%> Salah וְשֶׁ֖לַח <S%H7974><s%> and Salah יָלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> Eber

וּלְעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> And unto Eber יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> were born שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> sons שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הָֽאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> of one פֶּ֗לֶג <S%H6389><s%> [was] Peleg כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> in בְיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> for in his days נִפְלְגָ֣ה <S%H6385><s%> divided הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> was the earth וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brother's יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> [was] Joktan

וְיָקְטָ֣ן <S%H3355><s%> And Joktan יָלַ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַלְמוֹדָ֖ד <S%H486><s%> Almodad וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֑לֶף <S%H8026><s%> and Sheleph וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲצַרְמָ֖וֶת <S%H2700><s%> and Hazarmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָֽרַח׃ <S%H3392><s%> and Jerah
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדוֹרָ֥ם <S%H1913><s%> And Hadoram וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוּזָ֖ל <S%H187><s%> and Uzal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּקְלָֽה׃ <S%H1853><s%> and Diklah
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עוֹבָ֥ל <S%H5745><s%> And Obal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִֽימָאֵ֖ל <S%H39><s%> and Abimael וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבָֽא׃ <S%H7614><s%> and Sheba

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹפִ֥ר <S%H211><s%> And Ophir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲוִילָ֖ה <S%H2341><s%> and Havilah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹבָ֑ב <S%H3103><s%> and Jobab כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> all these [were] the sons יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> of Joktan

וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> extended מוֹשָׁבָ֖ם <S%H4186><s%> And their dwelling מִמֵּשָׁ֑א <S%H4852><s%> was from Mesha בֹּאֲכָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> as thou goest סְפָ֖רָה <S%H5611><s%> unto Sephar הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> a mount הַקֶּֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of the east

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8035><s%> of Shem לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לִלְשֹׁנֹתָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> after their tongues בְּאַרְצֹתָ֖ם <S%H776><s%> in their lands לְגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> after their nations

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֧ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons נֹ֛חַ <S%H5146><s%> of Noah לְתוֹלְדֹתָ֖ם <S%H8435><s%> after their generations בְּגוֹיֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> in their nations וּמֵאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these נִפְרְד֧וּ <S%H6504><s%> divided הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> and by these were the nations בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth אַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <S%H3999><s%> the flood פ
